@disable_on_this_host.description: Icon hover text to disable LivePage for entire host

@disable_on_this_page.description: Icon hover text to disable LivePage

@enable_on_this_host.description: Icon hover text to enable LivePage for entire host

@enable_on_this_page.description: Icon hover text to enable LivePage

@file_protocol_needs_enabling.description: When the protocol file:// needs enabling
@file_protocol_needs_enabling.message: Sorry, the file:// protocol needs enabling. Please check the "Allow access to file URLs" for LivePage on the extensions page (chrome://chrome/extensions/).

@live.description: The badge text for a live page

@options_allow_access_to_files.description: Inform user to enable 'Allow access to file URLs' on the extensions page
@options_allow_access_to_files.message: To use use the file:// protocol, make sure on the extension page (chrome://chrome/extensions/), you have ticked "Allow access to file URLs" for the LivePage extension.

@options_clear_all.description: Options Page: label for button that clears all active URLs

@options_contribute_and_support.description: English: Contribute & report bugs via GitHub

@options_entire_hosts.description: English: Run LivePage on entire domains

@options_ignore_anchors.description: Ignore everything after # in a URL.

@options_persist_scroll_points.description: English: Attempt to persist scroll X/Y positions
@options_persist_scroll_points.message: Attempt to persist scroll X/Y positions

@options_refresh_rate_note.description: English: Local development can safely be set to less than 175ms, developing on a live production server should be 250ms or higher.
@options_refresh_rate_note.message: Local development can safely be set to less than 175ms, developing on a live production server should be 250ms or higher.

@options_skip_external.description: English: Skip external resources such as googleapis.com or CDNs
@options_skip_external.message: Skip external resources such as googleapis.com or CDNs

@options_tidy_inline_html.description: English: Ignore inline JavaScript & hidden fields in HTML
@options_tidy_inline_html.message: Ignore inline JavaScript & hidden fields in HTML

@options_url_list_empty.description: Fallback message for when extension has not been activated on any pages yet
@options_url_list_empty.message: No URLs are currently live, clicking the icon next to the address bar will make a page live :)

@protocol_not_supported.description: When the protocol used is not support on a URL.
@protocol_not_supported.message: Sorry, the protocol used on this page is not supported.

browser_action.description: The default tooltip on the icon

description.message: LivePage reloads website resources such as CSS, HTML and JavaScript as they update on the server.
